DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of multiple ascending doses of RO4998452 compared to placebo in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus. Successive cohorts of patients will be randomized to receive either active drug, at escalating doses, or placebo. The anticipated time on study treatment is <3 months, and the target sample size is <100 individuals.
DOC.brief_title: A Multiple Ascending Dose Study of RO4998452 in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus.
DOC.criteria: adult patients, 1865 years of age; type 2 diabetes; either treated by diet and exercise alone or with metformin. type 1 diabetes mellitus; uncontrolled hypertension; clinically severe diabetic complications.
